body:
The existing nvshmem package uses a URL that is behind a login wall. This PR updates the package to use a newly available public URL, as well as add the most recent 2.1.2 version. 

I wasn't sure how to best handle a dependency on the `shmem.h` header as there is no separate shmem/openshmem Spack package. Current package here attempts to source the header from the MPI installation, which is what the existing package did.
title: Update nvshmem package to use public URL
